thread.section_title: Living: Weddings, Interior Design, Food, Travel, and Parties - Vogue
thread.title: The Most Beautiful and Delicious Halloween Candy for Adults
thread.title_full: The Most Beautiful and Delicious Halloween Candy for Adults - Vogue

author: Brooke Bobb
title: The Most Beautiful and Delicious Halloween Candy for Adults
text:
It’s hard not to love a good pumpkin-shaped Reese’s around Halloween, but there’s a whole wonderful world of candy to explore outside of the usual mini chocolate bars and M&M’s. Leave the typical sweets to the trick-or-treaters and try some more inventive (and more delicious) varieties: chewy rice candy; gourmet fruit roll-ups; and sugary, thick disks made of peanut marzipan. These 11 delightful treats also just happen to come wrapped in the prettiest, chicest little packages. Perfect for an adult candy bowl you’ll actually want to display front and center.
Vogue may earn compensation on these sales through affiliate programs.
